title: Nilaveni Diamond Ring - A Touch of Celestial Elegance
materials: Faceted Polki Diamonds. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: A striking floral motif ring. The central stone is accented by intricate kundan work in shades of deep midnight blue, resembling petals. Sparkling Polki diamonds are meticulously set between the 'petals', adding brilliance. The 'petals' surround the primary stone in a symmetrical, ray-like pattern, exhibiting a modern take on a traditional design.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Adds a touch of sophistication to traditional attire like sarees and lehengas
but can also beautifully accent contemporary outfits.
description: Handcrafted by master artisans, this ring showcases the rich heritage of Hyderabadi jewelry. The combination of Kundan and Polki diamonds creates a unique and eye-catching piece. The quality of the materials ensures that this ring will be a cherished heirloom for generations. The design blends tradition with contemporary sensibilities for a modern bride.
